var N = 16, x = d3.range(N), y = d3.range(N).map( d3.random.normal() ), data = [ { x:x, y:y, type:'scatter', mode:'markers', marker:{size:16} } ], layout = { hovermode:'closest', title:'Click on Points' }; Plotly.plot('myDiv', data, layout); $('#myDiv').bind('plotly_click', function(event,data){ var pts = ''; for(var i=0; i<data.points.length; i++){ pts = 'x = '+data.points[i].x +'\ny = '+ data.points[i].y.toPrecision(4) + '\n\n'; } alert('Closest point clicked:\n\n'+pts); });
